attributes.action: Convince the telematic engineer that he has made a bad decision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make Swansea city council telematic engineer revert to the old traffic light sequence in Gorseinon to ease the chaotic and dangerous traffic system that he has created

rejection.details: Pleaes contact Swansea City Council in the first instance
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
